message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. It's a unique opportunity to experience the best we have to offer. I am offering this product to you for $150, which is well below its market value of $200. This exclusive deal is available only to a select few, and I believe you would be a perfect fit for it. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested, and we can proceed with the purchase.
